name: sulu_demo
description: Basic bundle structure for a default website project.
author: Sulu GmbH

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run update:version
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:size
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:css:fix && npm run lint:js:fix
scripts.build:js: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run webpack
scripts.build:css: npm run lint:css:fix && npm run scss-autoprefix && npm run cssnano
scripts.scss-autoprefix: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer

scripts-info.build: Compiles the js and css, checks the code style and update the build version.
scripts-info.watch: Watch the js and css changes.
scripts-info.lint: Check the js and css code style.
scripts-info.lint:fix: Check the js and css code style and tries to fix it
scripts-info.build:js: Compiles js and checks the js code style.
scripts-info.watch:js: Compiles js and watches for changes.
scripts-info.lint:js:fix: Checks the js code style and tries to fix it.
scripts-info.build:css: Compiles css and checks the css code style.
scripts-info.watch:css: Compiles css and watches for changes.
scripts-info.lint:css:fix: Checks the css code style and tries to fix it.
scripts-info.update:version: Update the build version which is used for static assets.
